查看数据库该合作是否终止
    ${result}    Exec Sql    SELECT count(*) FROM prm_offline t,prm_sp g WHERE t.sp_isn=g.sp_isn AND g.sp_code='${SP_CODE}' ;    ${prm_oracle_tns}
    Should Be Equal As Integers    ${result}    1

设置附件为空
    [Arguments]    ${path}
    修改xml节点的值    \    ${path}/FileName
    修改xml节点的值    \    ${path}/FileSaveName
    修改xml节点的值    \    ${path}/FileSize
